clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Xanthophylls are taken for nutritional supplementation and also for treating dietary shortage or imbalance

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Lutein was found to be present in a concentrated area of the macula a small area of the retina responsible for central vision The hypothesis for the natural concentration is that lutein helps protect from oxidative stress and high energy light Several studies show that an increase in macula pigmentation decreases the risk for eye diseases such as Age related Macular Degeneration AMD
